name: Amazing Emoji Crush Game - Free
description:
*** Looking for an amazing emoji matching game? ***

Here it is: The all new emoji puzzle and action game.
Forget all your other matching games, this is the new way of playing!

Swap emojis to match 3 or more to get the highscore and
defeat the time. Get bonus for fast actions!

- Highscore
- Amazing emoji graphics
- Train your reaction and test your brain
- Match 3 game

Train your reaction and test your brain.
Download now for free!
